aboutMe.title: About me
aboutMe.text1: Hello, I'm Gonzalo Jaime. A full-stack developer from Argentina.
aboutMe.text2: Currently I'm studying at the University, but I have done some development courses that give me a pretty solid stack.
aboutMe.text3: I got some experience as a freelancer as well. I've done some projects for myself to improve and reinforce my skills, and some other to sell.
